meanings.definition: A way or passage from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The ancient Romans built viae to connect their cities.
meanings.sent2: The GPS guided us along the viae to reach our destination.
meanings.sent3: The viae seemed to play hide and seek with us as we tried to follow the map.
meanings.sent4: In the maze of life, we all search for our own viae to success.
meanings.sent5: The viae through the forest was filled with colorful flowers and chirping birds.

meanings.sent1: We reached the castle viae a secret tunnel.
meanings.sent2: She sent the package to her friend viae express delivery.
meanings.sent3: The magician amazed the audience by pulling a rabbit out of his hat viae magic.
meanings.sent4: His words cut through her heart viae a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The detective solved the case viae his keen observation skills.
